app.serverUnavailable: The server is not available at the moment or there was an error processing your request. Please try again later

login.notice1: Use your university email if possible.
login.notice2: Only your name and email are used for statistic purposes. These data will not be disclosed without your permission.

header.description: Generates questions about your own code!

codeSubmission.instruction: Copy and paste your code or select a .java file from your system. Make sure it has no errors!
codeSubmission.noQuestionsGenerated: No questions were generated for the code you submitted. Add at least a function to your submission.
codeSubmission.syntaticErrors: Your code contains errors. Please submit syntactically correct code.

answerSubmission.instruction: Answer to the following questions about your code:
answerSubmission.confidenceLevel: Confidence level for the given answer:
answerSubmission.correctAnswerIs: The correct answer for this question is:
answerSubmission.invalidSubmission: Invalid submission. Please fill all fields.
answerSubmission.submissionIncorrect: You answered at least one question incorrectly.
